comment: Valid car data. Should return a 200 OK response with a calculated carValue.
Valid car data. Should return a 200 OK response with a calculated carValue.
Valid car data. Should return a 200 OK response with a calculated carValue.
Invalid year format (string). Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_INVALID_YEAR_FORMAT.
Empty model string. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_EMPTY_MODEL.
Model is a number. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_INVALID_MODEL_TYPE.
Negative year. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_INVALID_YEAR_VALUE.
Year is null. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_INVALID_YEAR_VALUE.
Year is a decimal. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_INVALID_YEAR_VALUE.
Missing year. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_MISSING_YEAR.
Missing model. Should return a 400 Bad Request with an error message and errorCode E_MISSING_MODEL.
